alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 2:30PM CDT until June 11 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LATIMER AND WEST CENTRAL LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 230 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Wilburton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Talihina... Red Oak... Talimena State Park... Bengal... Panola... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
